author: A D Balasubramaniyan
text:
Information Technology Minister Mukkur N.Subramanian has planted 68 saplings of different tree species in district collectorate here on Monday to mark the beginning of plantation of 2,19,350 saplings in the district in view of 68th birth day of Ms.Jayalalithaa.

This would be Tiruvannamalai District’s contribution towards plating of 68 lakh saplings. Departments of Rural Development and Forest would plant these saplings while forest department has been entrusted the job of raising the saplings. Mr.N.Subramanian has handed over each Rs.1 lakh revolving fund to 12 forest Women Self Help Groups in the event.

District Collector A.Gnanasekaran presided over the event. District Revenue Officer S.Palani, Divisional Forest Officer K.Rajendran, Member of Parliament (Tiruvannamalai) R.Vanaroja, District Panchayat President M.S.Nainakkannu and Keelpennathur MLA A.K.Aranganathan were among those participated.
title: Over 2 lakh saplings to be planted
